headline: Analyst Recommends This Consumer Stock With Over 60 Years of Dividend Increases

headline: 2 Reasons to Like CL (and 1 Not So Much)
summary: Over the past six months, Colgate-Palmolive’s stock price fell to $78.09. Shareholders have lost 13.5% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 22.7%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
